About_me: I am currently working as a Pipeline Engineer, in PTE organization based in Bangalore.  I have a diversified experience of eleven years within Shell, across various geographical locations and work environments, including The Netherlands, U.S, Russia, India and Malaysia. My technical experience includes developing conceptual as well as detailed design studies for both offshore & onshore projects, including single/multi-phase pipeline systems.
Ask_me_about: Pipeline, Flow Assurance, Pipeline Design &Construction, Pipeline asset support
Name: Doe, Jane 25
Publications: Co-authored technical paper on the ‘Performance and condition monitoring of structures using discrete strain measurements’ (2009) InterNULLtioNULLl JourNULLl of COMADEM Vol. 12 No. 1 (Jan) pp. 2-14.
Role_Description_1: Detailed design of Deepwater Pipelines.Awarded SRA for assisting in preparation of the first “Deepwater Mater Class” session conducted in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, in 2011
Role_Description_2: Projects delivery through conducting front end engineering, feasibility studies, conceptual design, pipeline routing, Integrated technical reviews, and technical assurance.Support assets in performance enhancement and incident investigation studies.
Role_Description_3: Supervised the offshore pipeline installation activities ranging from start-up till pre-commissioning. As the onsite focal point for pipeline installation, coordinated the planning, scheduling and execution activities in conjunction with the project design team and offshore technical team.
Role_Description_4: Field Experience (Sakhalin II Phase 2) – Onshore Pipeline Construction. Shell’s focal point for ‘Soil Reinstatement and Erosion Control Campaign’.Ensured the timely execution of construction activities through planning, supervision, regular site inspections and progress reporting to the spread manager.
Role_Description_5: Joined as a graduate in Shell and participated in several trainings in Shell business processes and systems.Responsible design engineer in multi-disciplinary project teams during identify, assess and select phases of projects in EMEA portfolio including NLNG (Nigeria), Cove Point (USA), Tunisia, Sakhalin, etc.
